alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued January 01 at 7:51AM PST until January 02 at 9:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures of 33 to 36 degrees are expected late tonight through mid morning Sunday. Temperatures may drop as low as 29 to 32 degrees in the coldest wind-sheltered locations. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Frost is likely again on Sunday night.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
